DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of the incidence of gastric insufflation between two kinds of laryngeal masks airways: LMA SupremeTM vs Ambu AuraOnceTM
DOC.brief_title: Gastric Insufflation and Laryngeal Mask Airway
DOC.criteria: ASA 1 or 2 Age > 18 yrs Use of laryngeal mask airway required risk of pulmonary aspiration of gastric contents Contraindication for the use of laryngeal mask airway Tracheal intubation required Patient's refusal
